page.title: 19Transport to work
page.content:
Three quarters of the working people we spoke to did not work in Bugbrooke.As so many work outside Bugbrooke they need to use transport to get to work.
Car or van 184 Walking 27 Bus 22 Motorcycle 12 Bicycle 8 Train 5
Those who used the train had to get to the station by car or bus.Northampton was the station used by all the people we spoke to.
In 152 households we found 343 people over 17 years old and 195 cars.This means that there is 1 car for each 1.75 people who are eligible to drive.
